title: Associate Editors needed for IAFOR Journal of Education
content:
Now approaching the publication of its eighth volume, and positioned as the official journal for IAFOR education conferences globally, the IAFOR Journal of Education (JoE) is moving into a new era. The JoE is an internationally reviewed and editorially independent Open Access interdisciplinary journal, indexed with Scopus and other indexing agencies. The journalâ€™s Editor-in-Chief, Dr ...

The post Associate Editors needed for IAFOR Journal of Education appeared first on The International Academic Forum (IAFOR).
